name: Hook'd Trash
description:
Hook'd Trash is a small game where because many bodies of water are covered in trash you must clean it out using your good old fishing hook, but don't touch fish, people already ate 70% of the entire fish that have ever lived. Good Luck!

CONTROLS:

MAIN MENU: press A or D to pick one out of three levels to play, wich have different sizes, and different types of Fish. 

Press Space to Start your adventure of sitting in one place and saving the world

THE ACTUAL GAME: press SPACE to throw your hook

 press A or D to choose Upgrades and move your Hook Around. Press S to buy an upgrade or to speed up your hook's descenting speed

(Btw my first gamejam, all feedback is welcome)
